parameter.name: mining_algo
parameter.info: Algorithm to use for mining, greedy ReReMi or based on classification trees (restrictions apply). (single option in {reremi,layeredtrees,splittrees,cartwheel,fim})

parameter.name: LHS_data
parameter.info: Complete filename for the left hand side data. (open text)

parameter.name: RHS_data
parameter.info: Complete filename for the right hand side data. (open text)

parameter.name: NA_str
parameter.info: String representation for missing values (CSV format). (open text)

parameter.name: result_rep
parameter.info: Repertory where to save the results. (open text)

parameter.name: out_base
parameter.info: Name of the file where to store the results. (open text)

parameter.name: logfile
parameter.info: File to log. + means generate filename from queries output file. - means stdout. (open text)
